sourcesContent:
Registration

Name is required. Name must be at least 6 characters long.
Email is required. Invalid email format.
Password is required.
Already have an account? Login
import { Component } from "@angular/core"; import { FormGroup } from "@angular/forms"; @Component({ selector: "app-registration-form", templateUrl: "./registration-form.component.html", styleUrls: ["./registration-form.component.scss"], }) export class RegistrationFormComponent { registrationForm!: FormGroup; // Use the names `name`, `email`, `password` for the form controls. public name: string = ""; public email: string = ""; public password: string = ""; public formSubmitted = false; }
